name: 中世纪君主 Medieval Monarch
detailed_description:
Introduction

简介

My Lords!Here you play a Medieval ruler from a first person perspective.You can be a gentleman with no ambition but just for fun.Or be a conqueror with an ambition.Make the decision as you like or choose according to the traits of the ruler,It's all your call.You have to take care of politics, your children, diplomacy, war,banners and much more.
各位领主老爷好,在这里您将扮演一名以第一人称视角在中世纪生活的统治者,您可以作为偏安一隅的统治者,也可以成为一名宏图大志的球长.是按照您自己的喜好做出决定,还是按照所扮演统治者的特质做出选择,一切都是您说了算,您需要参与到个人的日常生活,封臣,政治,阴谋,继承,法律,子嗣,战争等事务中.最终使自己的国家代代相传.

Form your own court.

6 ministers.Different ministers have different functions,If a banner is minister ,he'll be happy !

组建自己的内阁.
六名内阁,不同的内阁有他自己的功能.成为内阁是对一名封臣的认可,也将促进他与您的关系.

Send the minister on duty.

Sending ministers on different missions,use them wisely.Let them better govern for you!

派遣内阁执行任务.
不同的大臣拥有不同的任务派遣,可以选择一项任务给大臣去执行,将帮助您更好的管理国家.

Change law.

Lex regia.Inheritance law.Banner law,Tax law,Religion law,These can be changed as rulers, but each time the law is changed it affects the whole country.

修改法律.
王权法,继承法,封臣法,税收法,宗教法,这些作为统治者都可以去修改,但是每一次修改法律都将势必影响到整个国家.

Administer your fief.

Build.Population.Loyalty.Conferring the knight,Tax.There are 15+ kinds of Buildings,5 professional works.Different jobs bring different results.

管理自己的封地.
封地建设,人口变动,提高民忠,骑士册封,是否免税.拥有15种建筑,5种职业,不同职业不同的效果,粮食,税收,民忠.男女人口的比例.

Join the conspiracy.


参与封臣的阴谋.
拉拢您加入到阴谋之中,或者与其对立.

Improve your ability.

Reading, writing, entertainment, archery, sword practice, competition, hunting, exploration an church.

提高自己的能力.
通过书房里读书,写作.训练场上的锻炼以及教堂可以提升自己属性经验以达到能力的提升.

Cultivate Heir.

If you don't have Heir, game over. Your heirs affect the fate of your country!

培养自己的继承人.
如果没有继承人,在统治者死亡后游戏将结束,所以一个好的继承人将影响到整个国家的命运.

Balancing banners factions.

Military,Eco,Old,neutral.Different factions like different things, if you do what factions like, faction support will be increased. Conversely, if faction support is too low, there will be a chance of faction defection.

平衡各个派系力量.
军事派,经济派,守旧派,中立派.不同派系喜欢的事情有所不同,如果您做了派系喜欢的事情,派系的支持度将得到提高.反之如果派系的支持度过低则会有几率爆发派系叛变.

Form your own faction.

In order to compete with the vassal factions, the rulers could form their own factions, similar to the royalists, who were loyal to the rulers.

组建自己的势力.
为了与派系之间的封臣抗衡,统治者可以组建自己的派系,类似于"保皇党",他们忠于统治者.

Diplomacy.

It depends on your diplomatic strategy whether to annex the neighboring countries or maintain good relations.

与其他国家周旋.
周边各国强弱不等,是吞并他们,还是保持良好的关系,这就看您的外交策略了.

Traits:

--Everyone has his traits, they have a greater chance to follow their traits to do something.

人物特质:
--每个人都有他自己的特质,他们有更大的几率会跟随自己的特质去做某些事情.

mood:

--Negative work, or active life, depending on the mood, mood will be reflected in the character's attributes.

人物心情:
--消极怠工,还是积极生活,这取决于心情,心情的影响将体现在人物的属性上.

Wish:

--Lords will do as they want, with 33 behaviors driving their lives.

领主的想法:
--各个领主老爷们将按照自己的想法去做事情,33种行为驱动各个领主的生活.

Research:

--The royal bishops were responsible for the research and development of science and technology, which were divided into three categories: military, competitive and cultural.

科技研发:
--宫廷主教负责科技的研发,分为军事,竞技,文化三项,每项分为五栏,每一栏可选一项,方可开启后面的科技,

Biography:

--Important events such as the granting of a Lord's wish, the acquisition of territory, the appointment of a cabinet, the coronation of a ruler, war, the bearing of children, and the succession of a peerage are recorded in the lives of individual characters.

人物生平记录:
--领主们达成了自己的愿望,获取领地,被任命内阁,加冕为统治者,战争,生儿育女,继承爵位等一切重要事件都将动态的记录在个人人物生平中.

Population:

--The population in the fiefdom was divided into multiple identities. The effects of different identities were different: farmer, merchant, militia, blacksmith, priest, knight, craftsman,More population types will be added later.

封地人口管理:
--封地中人口分为多种身份.不同身份所带来的效果不同,农夫,商人,民兵,铁匠,牧师,骑士,工匠,后期还会增加更多人口类型.

Intelligence

--In order to solve the situation of the vassal and the neighboring countries, the ruler needs to ask the minister of intelligence to do some information. If the information is insufficient, the relevant information will not be available, and even affect the diplomatic distance.

情报:
--统治者为了解封臣们的情况以及周边国家,需要让情报大臣做一些情报,如果情报不足将无法看到相关的信息,甚至会影响到外交的距离.

Rich life:

--You can go to the tavern with PaPaPa, or get information.Skills can be increase on the training ground,You can read in your study. The church is a sacred place.But if you want to be stimulated in a church, you might get caught. You can hunt and explore!

丰富生活:
--您可以在酒馆羞羞,也可以打探消息,可以在训练场锻炼技能,也可以在书房读书,教堂是个神圣的地方,但是如果你想在教堂刺激一下,被抓到可不好.您还可以打猎,探险,教育孩子读书,练武,参加比赛等其他活动!

Rich Event:

--Random events, causal events, and domestic events will fill the whole life, every decision has different consequences, and even affect their own mood!At present the event about 100 ~ follow-up unceasingly increases!

丰富的事件:
--随机的事件,因果事件,以及内政事件将充满整个生活,每一个决定都有着不同的后果,甚至会影响自己的心情!目前事件约100件~后续不断增加!

Modification:

--At present only open script editing scenario, and books added, language only provides Simplified CN and Traditional CN,Other languages can add or modify by modder.
--The LanguageID in the Setting file corresponds to the Excel column number of the form,0 simplified.1 traditional.2 ,3 ,4 and so on .... it's your call

编辑功能:
--目前仅开放玩家编辑剧本,和书籍添加,语言化只提供简体和繁体,其他语言开放可以自行编辑.
--Setting设置文件中LanguageID对应表格竖栏编号,0简体.1繁体.其余语言根据表格可以自行添加

There are other functions to please you as a noble ruler to experience!

Credit


-灰风-Forsaken ---新浪博主,部分背景图以及插图提供者

刘文飞 ---米画师画师,头像提供者
sheipu ---米画师画师,建筑内景图提供者
虚无行者北冥 ----知乎和贴吧人员,游戏内部分书籍作者.
还有其他无私奉献给予过帮助,测试,文案等可爱的人们!

Thank you!

About the development plan



--Map expansion
--地图东扩与细化

--Military operations and diplomatic refinement
--军事作战和外交细化

--Substantive voting function page and voting process
--实质性的投票功能页面以及投票过程

--Orthodox rulers
--开放东正教国家

--Republic of commerce rulers
--开放商业共和国家

--More government
--更多的政府体制

--More law
--法律的更深层细化

--The Crusaders
--十字军相关功能

--Great buildings
--特殊封地建筑

--Children Education
--子嗣的教育培养细化

--More life funcitons
--更多的生活功能

--More events and arts
--更多的事件与相关美术

--All the above needs to be done before the official release. And all the extended content will be provided to you free of charge!
--以上是要在正式发布之前需要完成的.而之后所有的扩展内容也将免费提供给各位!

--DLC?That's impossible!In this life there can be no DLC!Follow-up expansion function, heartily looks forward to!
--DLC?不存在的,这辈子都不可能有DLC!后续扩展功能尽情期待!

--The population in the fiefdom was divided into multiple identities. The effects of different identities were different: farmer, merchant, militia, blacksmith, priest, knight, craftsman,More population types will be added later.

--封地中人口分为多种身份.不同身份所带来的效果不同,农夫,商人,民兵,铁匠,牧师,骑士,工匠,后期还会增加更多人口类型.

Rich Event:

--Random events, causal events, and domestic events will fill the whole life, every decision has different consequences, and even affect their own mood!At present the event about 100 ~ follow-up unceasingly increases!

丰富的事件:
--随机的事件,因果事件,以及内政事件将充满整个生活,每一个决定都有着不同的后果,甚至会影响自己的心情!目前事件约100件~后续不断增加!

--At present only open script editing scenario, and books added, language only provides Simplified CN and Traditional CN,Other languages can add or modify by modder.
--The LanguageID in the Setting file corresponds to the Excel column number of the form,0 simplified.1 traditional.2 ,3 ,4 and so on .... it's your call

--目前仅开放玩家编辑剧本,和书籍添加,语言化只提供简体和繁体,其他语言开放可以自行编辑.
--Setting设置文件中LanguageID对应表格竖栏编号,0简体.1繁体.其余语言根据表格可以自行添加

--Map expansion
--地图东扩与细化

--Military operations and diplomatic refinement
--军事作战和外交细化

--DLC?That's impossible!In this life there can be no DLC!Follow-up expansion function, heartily looks forward to!

short_description: Here you play a Medieval ruler from a first person perspective.You can be a gentleman with no ambition but just for fun.Or be a conqueror with an ambition.Make the decision as you like or choose according to the traits of the ruler,It's all your call.You have to take care of politics, your children, diplomacy, war,banners and much more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core I3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 主流集显
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • Additional Notes: 仅支持16:9与16:10 推荐16:9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core I5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • Additional Notes: 仅支持16:9与16:10 推荐16:9

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
